Detailed Description

Storage class for groups of colortables.

Class stores colortables for each data layer.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Member Function Documentation

const Colortable * ColorDirectory::GetColortable (  int i )  throw ()
 

Colortable accessor.

Returns a const point to the specified colortable. If the index is out of range then NULL is returned.

Parameters:
i   the index of desired color table.
